name: nitsan/ns-faq
description: The Ultimate FAQ TYPO3 Extension helps in managing Frequently Asked Questions easy and efficient for your TYPO3 website. With its user-friendly backend module, you can effortlessly add, customize, and style the FAQs. It's fully compatible with the latest TYPO3 Version *** Live Demo: https://demo.t3planet.com/t3t-extensions/faq/ *** Premium Version, Documentation & Free Support: https://t3planet.com/ns-faq-typo3-extension
